Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.24172540] Gram-positive bacteria:S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC = 3.1 μM), S. aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC = 3.1 μM), S.epidermidis RP62A (MIC = 1.6 μM), S.epidermidis RP62A/1 (MIC = 0.8 μM), C.albicans ATCC 90028 (MIC = 50 μM);Gram-negative bacteria:E.coli (MIC = 6.25 μM), A. baumannii (MIC = 3.1 μM), S. maltophilia (MIC = 3.1 μM), K. pneumoniae (MIC = 12.5 μM), P. aeruginosa (MIC = 25 μM), P.mirabilis (MIC > 100 μM).[Ref.30789695] Cancer cell lines:A549 (IC50 = 1.82 ± 0.23 μM), HCT116 (IC50 = 6.50 ± 0.32 μM), HepG2 (IC50 = 4.96 ± 0.43 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.24172540] LC₅₀ = 174 ± 12 μM against freshly prepared human erythrocytes.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: No structure indentification experiment and detailed structure description found
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria; Anticancer activity.
Sequence Information.Comments: Ref.30789695 does not include results of antimicrobial, hemolysis and other biological assays
